item.description:
This month, Pamela is going to lead us in a Found Poetry exercise. Each participant will each get a page of text and some random images and scraps. They will use these to make an ATC or journal page with instructions given at the beginning of the activity.

This is a really fun exercise that will get the creative juices flowing! See you there!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: April 2010 NE ATC+ Meetup--note SUNDAY & 2 p.m. start time
